summary: Project to add functional Collaboration and Supporter Help contact forms (Name, Email, Optional Social links, Message, Submit) with backend storage and an admin panel tab to view submissions; current build/deploy attempts have failed so the update is not visible yet.
architectural_notes: Collaboration and Supporter Help forms should persist submissions to backend and be viewable in admin panel (similar to existing Fan Mail flow).
known_issues: Collaboration/Supporter Help forms not visible because UI changes were not successfully added/deployed.
Build/deploy failed with error: 'Our AI couldn't handle that request'.

existing_features.title: Add a Collaboration contact form to the Contact page that allows any visitor to type and submit: Name, Email, Optional Social Media Links, and a Message.
Add a Supporter Help contact form to the Contact page that allows any visitor to type and submit: Name, Email, Optional Social Media Links, and a Message.
Add React Query hooks for submitting and admin-fetching Collaboration and Supporter Help submissions, wired to the new backend actor methods.
Add admin dashboard tabs/panels so admins can view Collaboration and Supporter Help submissions in the admin panel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Collaboration contact form with fields (Name, Email, Optional Social Links, Message) + Submit and backend storage
Add Supporter Help contact form with fields (Name, Email, Optional Social Links, Message) + Submit and backend storage
Add admin panel tab(s) to view Collaboration and Supporter Help form submissions
Implement backend storage and APIs for Collaboration form submissions, including an admin-only method to list all submissions.
Implement backend storage and APIs for Supporter Help form submissions, including an admin-only method to list all submissions.

projectName: Add Collaboration & Supporter Help submission forms with admin viewing
